programme.title: Helene, tõeline pruut
Helene, die wahre Braut
programme.desc: Helene elab oma võõrasemaga, kes pole kunagi temaga rahul ja annab talle teha üle jõu käivaid töid. Ühel päeval avastab Helene, et ta saab viimases hädas kutsuda endale appi haldja. Tänu haldjale kohtub ta printsiga. Kahjuks aga on prints juba lapsepõlvest saati kihlatud naaberriigi printsessiga.(n)

programme.title: Peeter Pikk-kõrv
programme.desc: Peeter unustab emale emadepäevaks kingituse osta ja tema katse kooki küpsetada viib järjekordse seikluseni.(n)

programme.title: Abimehed galaktikast
programme.desc: Täna tekitab Röster Akvalangikupli planeedil suure segaduse!(n)

programme.title: Zombi Lars
programme.desc: Tess näeb, kuidas ta õde oma õhtuid veedab, ja see ei meeldi talle. Ta tahab Ninnit aidata, kahjuks selgub, et lihtsaid lahendusi pole olemas.(n)

programme.title: Zombi Lars
programme.desc: Irene on Robertist huvitatud ja poisil pole enam aega sõprade jaoks. Anna ja Tess kahtlustavad, et asi pole päris õige, kuid Robert ei taha kedagi kuulda võtta.(n)

programme.title: Sinu kätes
programme.desc: "Uus" Andrea on varasega võrreldes äärmiselt osavõtlik ja kaastundlik. Ta viib oma noore palatikaaslase Jacopo tolle kallima sünnitusele, kus poissi tabab taas ajuisheemia. Andreal soovitatakse vabatahtlikult lahkuda ja ta kaalub enesetappu. Kuid välja mõelnud, mis Jacopol tegelikult viga on, saab Andrea enesekindluse tagasi, keeldub lahkumisavaldust esitamast ja otsustab end üles töötada.(n)

programme.title: Kultuuristuudio. Looming
programme.desc: Esimene saade toob vaatajate ette koreograaf Teet Kase kaks märgilist teost. Saatejuht Ave Häkli uurib tantsulavastuste “Kuldne tempel ja “Louis XIV Kuningas Päike” sünnilugu ja olulisust lavastaja enda jaoks. Teoseid aitavad analüüsida tantsukriitik Heili Einasto ning koostööst ja loomeprotsessist räägivad muusik Sander Mölder ning kirjanik Tõnu Õnnepalu. Režissöör Ülle Õun.(n)

programme.title: 31. jaoskond
programme.desc: Patrick leiab Alexandre Gagnoni Juneau maja eest. Uurijad üritavad Théo vanemaid rahustada. Cloutier meelest pole Nadine'il uurimise jaoks piisavalt kogemusi ja ta pöördub ülem Chiassoni poole.(n)

programme.title: 31. jaoskond
programme.desc: Laurent hoiatab Stéphane'i Nadine'i eest. Isabelle ja Laurent räägivad hooldekodu töötajaga, kes pakub klientidele seksteenuseid. Vihje peale arreteerib politsei mänguväljaku juures nähtud kahtlase tegelase. Nadine tahab küsitleda poissi, kes nägi Théod pargis koos tundmatu täiskasvanuga.(n)

programme.title: 31. jaoskond
programme.desc: Patrick ja Isabelle teostavad Juneau majas läbiotsimise. Nadine satub jälle Stéphane'iga konflikti. Juneau elukaaslane teatab talle politsei huvist ja on mehe peale pahane. Stéphane tabab narkoreidi käigus Laurenti poja kallima.(n)

programme.title: 31. jaoskond
programme.desc: Laurent nõuab meeskonnalt tulemusi. Juneau elukaaslane Geneviève räägib Nadine'ile oma mehe probleemidest. Julie räägib politseis juhtunust Félixile. Carl Juneau ja tema advokaat nõuavad politsei vastu lähenemiskeeldu. Laurent püüab jätkuvalt Bruno Gagnéd uurimisse kaasata.(n)

programme.title: On meie keskel suvi
programme.desc: On meie keskel suvi, hoi-lii, hoi-laa, hoi-loo! Nii laulavad "Entel-Tenteli" laululapsed Arne Oidi ja Ellen Niidu laule ning kutsuvad meidki osa saama suverõõmudest. Lauljaid saadab Kustas Kikerpuu ansambel. Režissöör Tiiu Vahi.(n)

programme.title: Kool Schreckensteini kindluses ehk suudlemine pole keelatud
Burg Schreckenstein 2
programme.desc: Peale krahvi õnnetust on Schreckensteini kindluses asuv kool ohus, isegi terve kindlus on ohus, sest krahvi pärija otsustab kindluse hiinlastele maha müüa. Kui see peaks teoks saama, võetakse kindlus koost lahti ja viiakse teisele poole maakera Euroopa ajaloo teemaparki. Jean mainib pooljuhuslikult, et lossi võiks päästa peidetud varandus. Väidetavalt on kusagil varjul aare, aga pole aarete kaarti ega muud märki sellest. Poisid asuvad kaarti ja varandust otsima.(n)

programme.title: Võrkpalli naiste hõbeliiga
programme.desc: Eesti naiste võrkpallikoondis lõpetab Euroopa Hõbeliiga kodused alagrupimängud Põhja-Makedoonia vastu. Eesti naiskond on võtnud eesmärgiks jõuda Hõbeliigas alagrupist edasi. Võrdluses Põhja-Makedooniaga omatakse viimastest aastatest ka Euroopa meistrivõistluste finaalturniiril osalemise kogemust. Eesti ja Põhja-Makedoonia naiskondade kohtumine peetakse Tartu Ülikooli spordihoones.(n)

programme.title: Öö mänguasjamuuseumis
programme.desc: Kõige vahvam paik Tartu linnas on mänguasjamuuseum. Seal on palju nukke, kaisukarusid, autosid, ronge, tinasõdureid ja kõikvõimalikke muid mänguasju. Päeval, kui muuseum on avatud, saavad lapsed nendega tutvust teha. Öösel aga, kui kõik külastajad on lahkunud, hakkab muuseumitubades toimuma midagi eriskummalist. Mida teevad mänguasjad öösel? See on hästivarjatud saladus. Me oleme valmis Sinuga seda saladust jagama Teatri Kodu laval! Tiia Toometi lasteraamatu "Karu Lillekäpa töö-ööd" ainetel dramatiseerinud Leino Rei ja Tiia Toomet. Lavastaja Leino Rei, kunstnik Mare Hunt, muusikalised kujundajad Taisto Uuslail ja Ivi Rausi, valguskunstnik Martin Meelandi. Mängib Kristo Toots. Lavastuse viimase etenduse Teatri Kodu laval võttis üles režissöör Mati Kark, juhtoperaator Meelis Kadastik, toimetaja Aivi Parijõgi, produtsent Margus Saar.(n)

programme.title: Mina ja Miia
programme.desc: Miial on sünnipäev ja Saara üllatab teda väikese koogiga ning matkaga mägedesse. Tsentoopiasse jõuab Miia täpselt Lillela kuupidustuste ajaks. Juko õde Kuki ei usu, et ballaad Kuuükssarvikust on tõsi, ja haldjad lähevad sellele tõestust otsima, kohtudes teel unes tantsiva Viksiga.(n)

programme.title: Võrkpalli kuldliiga
programme.desc: Eesti meeste võrkpallikoondis võõrustab oma viimases Euroopa Kuldliiga koduses alagrupimängus Tšehhit. Vastane on suurte võrkpallitraditsioonidega riik – ka eelmistel Euroopa meistrivõistlustel jõudsid tšehhid veerandfinaali.(n)

programme.title: Jüri Üdi klubi
programme.desc: Mis on täna kõige olulisem ühe raamatu, näidendi, filmi, heliteose, kõne juures? Mis on modellide, kunstnike, filmitähtede, diktaatorite, riigikontrolöride ja tuumafüüsikute tähtsaim inimomadus? Muidugi, see on seksikus! Seksikus on teinud meie kultuuris ja ühiskonnaelus kiire ning särava karjääri - pääsenud magamistoast linade vahelt tribüünide ja lavade rambivalgusesse, salamõtetest avaliku kiituse pjedestaalidele. Räägimegi seksikusest.(n)

programme.title: Punklaulupidu
programme.desc: Maailma esimene punklaulupidu toimus 7. juunil 2008. aastal Rakveres, kus ligi 2000 koorilauljat võtsid ette meie kõigi poolt armastatud Singer-Vingeri, Vennaskonna, Propelleri ja teiste bändide palad ning laulsid need tõeliselt suureks ja ilusaks. Üllatusliku laulupeo idee ja lavastus pärineb Üllar Saaremäelt, peojuhiks oli Peeter Volkonski, peadirigendiks Hirvo Surva, kunstnikuks Hardi Volmer. Laulupeo avas president Toomas Hendrik Ilves. Režissöör Erle Veber, toimetaja Johannes Tralla, juhtoperaator Jüri Suurevälja, produtsendid Heiki Sepp ja Mart Normet.(n)

programme.title: The Brothers Grimsby
programme.desc: Nobby has a large family of nine and a loving wife, but despite this beautiful life, he misses his brother, Sebastian, an MI6 agent. Nobby tries to find his brother after years of separation when they were adopted by many families. Then the brothers are exposed to many obstacles and difficulties.

programme.title: Snowpiercer
programme.desc: After a failed climate-change experiment , ice age destroys life on the planet except some survivors, who take a huge train (Snowpiercer) as a place of survival. The elite live at the front, while the poor live at the back. But 17 years later, the tail's inhabitants start a rebellion led by Curtis (Chris Evans).

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: In an attempt to spread world chaos, a group of professional assassins is determined to kill the Chinese Premiere. Only the secret agent Johnny English is capable of saving the day. For Johnny English, disaster may be an option, but failure never is.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: When aliens misinterpret video-feeds of classic arcade games as a declaration of war, they attack the Earth using the games as models for their various assaults. The president decides to seek help from an old friend, who had also been romantically involved with his wife in the past, and who happens to be a former 1980s video game champion, by assigning him to lead a team of old-school arcaders to defeat the aliens.

programme.title: The Man from U.N.C.L.E
programme.desc: During the cold war, an organization of criminals decides to bring technology and nuclear weapons to the game between the United States and the Soviet Union. That's when CIA agent Solo and KGB Kutyakin need to leave their hostilities aside to bring down the criminal organization.

programme.title: Inside Man
programme.desc: A trained gang performs a bank heist in an organized manner, and a federal agent is assigned to negotiate with them. Another agent is assigned to protect valuable assets inside a bank safe, leading to a series of negotiations from several ends.

programme.title: Man on a Ledge
programme.desc: In New York City, Nick Cassidy (actor Sam Worthington) checks in an hotel under a false name. He heads on the top floor, climbs on the ledge and gets ready to suicide. Police arrives and isolate the area, however Nick refuses to talk with anyone except to negotiator Lydia Mercer (actress Elizabeth Banks). Lydia arrives at the hotel room and finds out that Nick is an ex-policeman who was arrested for stealing a $40-million diamond from businessman David Englander (actor Ed Harris). Nick claims innocence and pushes the police to re-investigate in the case. Actually Nick's hidden plan is distracting the policemen while his brother Joey (actor Jamie Bell) and Joey's girlfriend Angie (actress Genesis Rodriguez) break into Englander's upper floor jewelry vault in the building across the street to steal the diamond and prove Nick's innocence.

programme.title: Hell or High Water
programme.desc: A divorced father and his ex-con brother start a series of bank robberies to keep their family's ranch in West Texas, while two Texas Rangers try to catch them.

programme.title: Prisoners
programme.desc: When Keller Dover's (Hugh Jackman) daughter and her boyfriend go missing, the police start searching for leads to find her, but when they fail due to lack of evidence, Dover takes matters into his own hands.

programme.title: Zodiac
programme.desc: A serial killer calling himself Zodiac taunts the police by sharing the details of his murders and sending cryptic messages to the press. A police officer, a journalist and a cartoonist form an unlikely team to hunt him down.

programme.title: Johnny English Strikes Again
programme.desc: Johnny English comes out of retirement and goes on a new mission that requires overcoming the challenges of modern technology in order to track down the mastermind behind a cyber-attack.

programme.title: Hell or High Water
programme.desc: A divorced father and his ex-con brother start a series of bank robberies to keep their family's ranch in West Texas, while two Texas Rangers try to catch them.

programme.title: Man on a Ledge
programme.desc: In New York City, Nick Cassidy (actor Sam Worthington) checks in an hotel under a false name. He heads on the top floor, climbs on the ledge and gets ready to suicide. Police arrives and isolate the area, however Nick refuses to talk with anyone except to negotiator Lydia Mercer (actress Elizabeth Banks). Lydia arrives at the hotel room and finds out that Nick is an ex-policeman who was arrested for stealing a $40-million diamond from businessman David Englander (actor Ed Harris). Nick claims innocence and pushes the police to re-investigate in the case. Actually Nick's hidden plan is distracting the policemen while his brother Joey (actor Jamie Bell) and Joey's girlfriend Angie (actress Genesis Rodriguez) break into Englander's upper floor jewelry vault in the building across the street to steal the diamond and prove Nick's innocence.

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: In Fargo, Minnesota, car salesman Jerry Lundegaard hires two men to kidnap his wife for a $ 1 million ransom paid by his wealthy father-in-law, but the plan gets complicated causing a series of heinous murders.

programme.title: Paddington
programme.desc: Paddington follows the comic misadventures of a young Peruvian bear with a passion for all things British, who travels to London in search of a home. Finding himself lost and alone at Paddington Station, he begins to realise that city life is not all he had imagined - until he meets the kindly Brown family, who read the label around his neck ('Please look after this bear. Thank you.') and offer him a temporary haven. It looks as though his luck has changed until this rarest of bears catches the eye of a museum taxidermist.

programme.title: Paddington 2
programme.desc: Paddington is happily living with the Brown family in Windsor Gardens, where he becomes a popular member of the community. He finds a special book to give to his Aunt Lucy for her 100th birthday at Mr. Gruber's antique shop, and gets involved in a series of peculiar jobs to buy it.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: As Peter Rabbit and his sisters enjoy sneaking into Mr. McGregor's vegetable garden, things get complicated when his nephew, Thomas, moves into his house and sets out to get rid of the rabbits.

programme.title: Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children
programme.desc: When Jack's grandfather leaves him a myriad of clues that span different places and ages, leading to a place called Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children, he is soon shocked by the peculiarity of the residents and their special abilities, and it gradually unfolds that only Jack can save them.

programme.title: Mile 22
programme.desc: Assigned to Indonesia, a top notch intelligence officer, backed up by top-secret tactical command unit, is commissioned to smuggle a police officer out of the country, as he has some sensitive and classified information.

programme.title: Nerve
programme.desc: The film revolves around a high school senior, who becomes completely immersed in an online game of Truth or Dare, where her every move is manipulated by an anonymous community of "watchers.".

programme.title: The Commuter
programme.desc: A former cop's commute takes a dark turn when his wife's life is held as leverage against him identifying a mysterious passenger on the train he is on. With time running out, the stakes have never been so high as he is drawn into a complex conspiracy with a deadly outcome.

programme.title: 24 Hours to Live
programme.desc: After an experimental surgery that brings him back to life for one day, assassin killer, Travis Conrad has 24 hours to work with the team of women who killed him, seek revenge from the crime organization that was responsible for the murder of his wife and child, and seek personal redemption.

programme.title: Black and Blue
programme.desc: When a new African-American New Orleans cop witnesses a group of corrupt policemen ruthlessly kill a drug dealer, she tries to balance the two sides of her identity as the said men chase her all through the night to eliminate the evidence she has on them.

programme.title: Mona Lisa Smile
programme.desc: Katherine Ann Watson leaves Los Angeles in 1953 to take up a professorship at Wellesley College, a conservative school for girls, where the art history teacher tries to push her students to open up and think free.

programme.title: The Promise
programme.desc: A love triangle brings together the brilliant medical student Michael, the attractive and sophisticated Ana, and the renowned photojournalist Chris. As the two men clash over Ana, they've to come together when public chaos follows the crumbling of the Ottoman Empire.

programme.title: Café Society
programme.desc: This is a love story about making choices at a time of uncertainty. When the Bronx native Bobby arrives to Hollywood, hoping to start a career in the film industry, he crosses paths with a lovely woman who just happens to be seeing a married man. Where does this leave them.

programme.title: My Week with Marilyn
programme.desc: A week in the life of the simple assistant director Colin Clark who accompanies Marilyn Monroe while filming The Prince and Show Girl in 1957, a week of passion, tension, fame, and interrelated relationships.

programme.title: A United Kingdom
programme.desc: Based on true events, the film revolves around Prince Seretse Khama of Botswana (David Oyelowo), who caused a strong international uproar; when he married a white woman from London, Ruth Williams (Rosamund Pike), in the late 1940s.

programme.title: The Commuter
programme.desc: A former cop's commute takes a dark turn when his wife's life is held as leverage against him identifying a mysterious passenger on the train he is on. With time running out, the stakes have never been so high as he is drawn into a complex conspiracy with a deadly outcome.

programme.title: Paul
programme.desc: A chance encounter between two nerds and an alien hanging out outside Area 51 leads to a high-stakes journey to return the alien to its spaceship before they all get caught by the FBI.

programme.title: Hot Fuzz
programme.desc: In order to avoid unwanted comparisons with their own track records, the supervisors of skilled London officer Nicholas Angel banish him to the quiet small town of Sandford. But the small town soon becomes the location of some suspicious incidents that Angel is determined to get to the bottom of.

programme.title: This Is the End
programme.desc: James Franco invited many of his friends to attend his housewarming party in LA including Jonah Hill, Seth Rogen, Jay Baruchel, Craig Robinson, Michael Cera and others. Suddenly, during the party, the Biblical Apocalypse begins. They hide inside the house and try to survive the end of the world.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: A horror comedy about two guys who have succeeded in remaining alive in the midst of a zombie outbreak. Their secret to survival: an alliance with sorcerers and a little bit of explosive firepower.

programme.title: The Deep
programme.desc: The Nekton family are daring underwater explorers living aboard The Aronnax submarine, exploring uncharted waters and unraveling the mysteries of the deep.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S5
programme.desc: SpongeBob returns for more underwater adventures, driven along by his curiosity and his attempt to discover everything new in his world.

programme.title: The Legend of Korra
programme.desc: Events take place 70 years after "Avatar: The Last Airbender", as (Korra) moves to Republic City to control the last element: the air, and with the guidance of Aang's son, Tenzin, She has to fight crime and protect the city from the dark forces surrounding it.

programme.desc: The story of a boy and seven small dogs, trying to save people from the problems they create and save the city's inhabitants from dangers.

programme.title: Ordinary Love
programme.desc: A happily married couple faces the ultimate test when the wife is diagnosed with cancer. Over the course of her treatment, the two of them must rely on each other for strength and support.

programme.title: The Machinist
programme.desc: Trevor Reznik, a machinist, suffers from a severe case of insomnia that has begun to affect his health. When an unfamiliar co-worker causes him to accidentally injure another co-worker, he begins to believe that he is deliberately trying to drive him insane, as he spirals into paranoia and delusion.

programme.title: Ordinary Love
programme.desc: A happily married couple faces the ultimate test when the wife is diagnosed with cancer. Over the course of her treatment, the two of them must rely on each other for strength and support.

programme.title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
programme.desc: The story of the famous 17th century painting "Girl With a Pearl Earring". Griet (Scarlett Johansson) works as a maid in the home of painter Johannes Vermeer (Colin Firth). Vermeer agrees to paint Griet and she secretly pose for the painting while dealing with gossip in the secret servant world.

programme.title: Help, I Shrunk My Friends
programme.desc: After the new girl Melanie arrives at Felix's school, he falls for her, which upsets his friends. But when they ruin Felix's date with Melanie, he involuntarily shrinks them, thus bringing about a drastic chain of events.

programme.title: Hello, My Name Is Doris
programme.desc: When Doris becomes infatuated with her much younger co-worker John, her crush leads her to experience life in a way that she has never known before. As she braves criticism from everyone around her, she puts her heart on the line since her crush may be one-sided.(n)

programme.title: Gossip Girl S5
programme.desc: As Blair plans her wedding, she has to reckon with her feelings for Chuck, which brings about unforeseen tragic consequences. Meanwhile, Serena tries to prove herself on the movie set and decide on the direction she wants her life to take.(n)

programme.title: Bringing Down the House
programme.desc: Peter Sanderson is a lawyer who's divorced living with his kids . He meets a woman named Charlene, who escaped from prison after being accused of armed robbery. Peter tries to stay away from her, but she asks for his help in proving her innocence, and refuses to leave until he does.(n)

programme.title: Dogman
programme.desc: The mild-mannered dog groomer Marcello decides to put an end to the crimes of the thuggish former boxer Simone, who forces him to do petty crimes and terrorizes the whole neighborhood.(n)

programme.title: Legacy of Lies
programme.desc: After retiring from his work in MI6, former agent Martin Baxter is thrust back into his old dangerous life, as he joins forces with a Ukrainian journalist to uncover a conspiracy that is connected to Russian covert operations.

programme.title: The Bouncer
programme.desc: In order to secure the life of his daughter and regain her custody from social services, a bouncer in his fifties has to take a mission to help the Interpol bring a crime lord to justice.

programme.title: Between Worlds
programme.desc: The trucker Joe finds himself facing an unusual situation after he is recruited to help a spiritually-gifted mother save her comatose daughter, Billie. But Billie is possessed by the spirit of Joe's late wife, who is not about to relinquish her hold on Billie as she still has business to attend to.

programme.title: Semper Fi
programme.desc: After his brother is imprisoned, a dedicated member of the Marine Corps struggles to maintain his respect for the word of the law when he knows that the sentence was not fair. After a disillusioning tour in Iraq, he resolves to do right by his brother, whatever it takes.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: Torn between his allegiance to two different worlds, Hellboy struggles with the fact that accepting his real heritage might lead to an apocalypse, all while resisting the machinations of a witch intent on destroying the world.

programme.title: Survivor
programme.desc: A Foreign Service Officer who has recently been employed in the American embassy in London is charged with the mission to stop a terrorist attack targeting spots in New York city. But when she gets falsely charged with crimes she did not commit, she is forced to go on the run, trying to clear her name and also continue her original mission.

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Jason Bourne has a close call with a corrupt C.I.A offical and his group of agents in a new assassination program. At the same time, he looks for answers about his life as a professional hit-man.

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
programme.desc: In the fourth Jason Bourne feature film, a unique agent, Aaron Cross, is enrolled in an enhanced US Defense Department black ops program "Operation Outcome". Agents are given chemical pills to genetically amplify their abilities. After the older programs are publicly exposed, CIA directors are investigated followed by a decision to shut down Outcome and eliminate all its agents and scientists.

programme.desc: Ben Aronoff, a speedboat racer, gets in trouble as he leads a double life that earns him the wrath of both law enforcers and drug lords, while his life hangs in the balance.

programme.desc: A victim of domestic abuse,Anna Poliatova, accepts an offer to become an undercover KGB assassin while working as a model. She shows indelible strength and fearsome determination to reach one goal: her freedom. But first, Anna must survive the conflicting agendas of the KGB and the CIA.(n)

programme.title: The Bank Job
programme.desc: This film takes place in 1970s London; Terry Leather is a salesmen, happily married with children, and few secrets to keep. When an old friend, Martine Love, offers up a scheme to make some quick cash, Terry finds himself unable to refuse. With the help of a carefully selected crew including Kevin Swain and David Shilling, they rent a warehouse on Baker Street and begin tunneling to the nearby Loyd Bank. With their eye on the money stored in the bank’s safety deposit boxes, the crew finds themselves in for much more than they bargained.(n)

programme.title: Mob Town
programme.desc: A depiction of the huge meeting of the mafia in 1957 New York, where the FBI and a local cop attempted to track mafia members.

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: Set around the world of oil and drilling in the depths of the seas, where one of the American oil platforms exploded in 2010; which resulted in the largest oil spill in the history of the United States.

programme.title: Wakefield
programme.desc: Howard Wakefield (Bryan Cranston) a successful New York City lawyer, goes through a bold turn in his family life. As he goes home from work one night ,and hides in his garage attic peeping from there, secretly watching the impact of his disappearance on his wife (Jennifer Garner) and family.

programme.title: Drunk Parents
programme.desc: The married couple Frank and Nancy find themselves in a bind, after facing financial difficulties that make them unable to pay for their daughter's education. They attempt to figure out a way to fix the situation, while hiding their problem from everyone around them.

programme.title: The Vanishing
programme.desc: On an isolated island off the Scottish coast, three lighthouse keepers come across a trunk loaded with gold, and their paranoia and greed lead them into a battle for survival.

programme.title: Peace, Love & Misunderstanding
programme.desc: Brought down by her impending divorce, Diane seeks a break by taking her two children to visit her estranged hippie mother. What starts as a weekend gateway might just end up what mends her relationship with her mother and heals her broken heart.

programme.title: Arctic
programme.desc: In the wake of a plane crash, a man gets stranded in the Arctic. Faced with a frozen wasteland and dangerous prospectives, he has to make the difficult choice between remaining in his current camp or venturing out into the frozen wilderness looking for rescue.

programme.title: Valley of the Gods
programme.desc: As John Ecas tries to move on from a broken relationship, he decides to write the novel he has always dreamed of writing, only to run into an eccentric trillionaire and form a relationship that turns him into a biographer for the reclusive man.

programme.title: Poms
programme.desc: When the fatally-ill Martha moves into a retirement community to spend her last days in peace, the last thing she expects is for her fun-loving neighbor to convince her that there's still time to revive her old dream of being a cheerleader.(n)

programme.title: Love Happens
programme.desc: This picture is a romantic drama that was written and directed by Brandon Camp. The film stars Jennifer Aniston and Aaron Eckhart. Burke Ryan (Aaron Eckhart) is full of grief. His wife has lost her life in an auto accident and he has yet to overcome her loss. In an attempt to help himself, Ryan writes a book about ways to deal with grief. While holding a workshop in his deceased wife’s hometown of Seattle, he meets Eloise (Jennifer Aniston). Despite being an “expert” on the topic, Ryan is nonetheless not dealing well with the loss of his wife – he will need all the help that Eloise can give him in order to overcome that trauma and find happiness again.(n)

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: During the time of the Roman empire, Emperor Marcus Aurelius decides that his heir will be General Maximus. However, his son, Commodus, murders him before he has a chance to act on his decision, and he becomes the Emperor after his father. Commodus then decides that Maximus must be killed, who in a turn of events, becomes a gladiator and a hero in people's eyes.(n)

programme.title: Sweetness in the Belly
programme.desc: As she flees the civil war in Ethiopia, Lilly seeks refuge in her parents' homeland in England, quickly finding purpose as she seeks to reunite people with their families with the help of her friend Amina, all while hiding her relationship with the doctor, Aziz.(n)

programme.desc: When her car breaks down at a client's house, health practitioner Beatriz accepts her client's invitation to join her for dinner, only to end up butting heads with an arrogant billionaire who comes from a world completely different from her own.(n)
